House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05934
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT 8484, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "ACCESS DEVICES REGULATION ACT OF 1998"
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : EVARDONE, BEN P.
DATE FILED : 2017-07-04
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Alvarez (F.) (015 2017-08-29)2. Belmonte (R.) (020 2017-09-07)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2017-08-23
          -1st deliberation. Bill amends Access Devices Regulation Act, an offshoot to the hacking, scheming and other malpractices issues on BPI and BDO. Approved in consolidation with HB 5723.
      2. Committee Report filed on 2017-11-23
          -Committee Report 490 Substitute Bill 6710
MOTHER BILL: HB06710
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON BANKS AND FINANCIAL INTERMEDIARIES ON 2017-07-25
